item.title: Angry at Bash
item.description: DISCLAIMER: Image is generated using FREE version of ChatGPT. Angry at Bash I have noticed a very weird behavior in bash recently that I’ve never seen in my entire career of over two and a half decades. Look at this one line to create a text file: $ echo "Hello World!!" > hello.txt This is what one does as a quick win, right? What would you expect?
